channel.title: Allowing people to connect to my server on a Vista Computer
channel.description:
Noone can connect to my server from my computer, I cannot ipconfig because of whatever reason and Its really bugging me. My friend cant get on.
Please, if you know how to connect from a vista, tell me lol. I really wanna play with my friend.

item.title: Allowing people to connect to my server on a Vista Computer
item.dc:creator: @nerdboyxx nerdboyxx
item.description:
@nerdboyxx wrote:

Got it working, portforwarded, I just gotta wait 4 my friend to try and connect again once he gets back from wherever he went

thanks for all the assistance, it seems really hard until someone tells you. Im faceplanting myself right now seeing how easy this is lol. Tyvm all your help was awesome I’d rep u but I cant as u can see (only 10 rep).

Read full topic
item.source: Allowing people to connect to my server on a Vista Computer

item.title: Allowing people to connect to my server on a Vista Computer
item.dc:creator: @MoparScapeHelp MoparScapeHelp
item.description:
@MoparScapeHelp wrote:

The only thing you did wrong was PORTFORWARDING, and to fix the “ipconfig”, Right click the command prompt, and click “Run As Administrator”. When you did that, type in “ipconfig”. Where it says IPV4 Adress, that is the thing you put in your PORTFORWARING THING.
For example:

untitled-14.png924×357

Read full topic
